startDateTime.description:
The start of the data retrieval range, in ISO 8601 format.

Default: The oldest available record.

endDateTime.description:
The end of the data retrieval range, in ISO 8601 format.

Default: The time you make the request.

orderBy.description:
The field by which the results are sorted.

Data is displayed in ascending order by default.


Supported fields:
* 'lastUpdatedDateTime'
* 'riskLevel'

Supported operators:
* asc - Ascending order
* desc - Descending order

filter.description:
Filter for retrieving a subset of the detection model list.

Supported fields:

|Field|Description|Supported values|
|---------|---------|---------|
|riskLevel| The severity assigned to the model |`Critical`, `High`, `Medium`, `Low`|
|enabled| The status of the model |`true`,`false`|
|modelType| The type of the model |`sae`, `ti`|
|requiredProducts| The products that use the detection model | Any value |

Supported operators:
| Operator | Description | Notes |
|----------|-----------|---------|
|`eq`|Operator 'equal to' | - |
|`and`|Operator 'and' | - |
|`or`|Operator 'or' | - |
|`not`|Operator 'not' | - |
|`()`|Symbols for grouping operands with their correct operator | - |
| `hassubset`| Filter for arrays |hassubset(requiredProducts,['xes']) |
filter.example: modelType eq 'sae' or (riskLevel eq 'Critical' and enabled eq 'true' and hassubset(requiredProducts,['xes','sds']))

top.description:
Number of records displayed on a page.

Default: 50
